main event: An unidentified object was observed in Houma, Louisiana on April 10, 1967, for about 20 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as irregularly shaped and emitting a steady, glowing light., Radar confirmed a stationary target matching the visual description., The object was observed at an elevation of approximately 10 degrees., It moved downward and forward, then back to its original position during the observation., The duration of radar contact with the object is not stated in the report.
